RateClassCode.description: Rate category code. Refer  CXML Code List 1.4,  e.g. Q - Quantity Rate

CommodityItemNumber.description: Commodity identifier on which the rate class code is applied

RatingTypeIndicator.description: Transportation rating type - e.g. F for Face, P for Published, or A for Actual Rating detail

RCP.description: City code of Rate Combination Point (RCP), the point over which sector rates are combined

LoadTypeCode.description: Bulk or containerized (BLK or ULD) indicator

ULDRateClassType.description: Unit Load Device rate class type e.g. 1P

RateClassBasis.description: Basis on which the Rate Class Code is applicable

RateReferenceCode.description: Code to indicate the applicable rate

RateReferenceType.description: Type of rate - e.g. contract, adhoc, etc.

SubTotalAmount.description: Subtotal of weight and valuation charges for the piece group
